content.description: Start is the same as Colonel Angus, but instead of going right, follow the seam up and left
content.location: You can reach this boulder by walking up the gully South of the trail leading into the Undiscovered Country for about a mile.  Or, you can walk straight down the hill from My Infested Destiny for about 400 yards.  While walking up the gully there will be a very obvious boulder with a heavily feature, orange face.  The Colonel Angus boulder is about 100 feet East of this boulder.  The climbs face away from the gully

content.description: Start on a low right hand sidepul and a left hand crimp about 3 feet off the ground.  Use sidepulls and crimps to reach the jugs above
content.location: You can reach this boulder by walking up the gully South of the trail leading into the Undiscovered Country for about a mile.
